name: cartridge
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small part with a particular purpose that can be easily replaced with another similar part, used in a larger piece of equipment : an ink/printer cartridge
a small tube containing an explosive substance and a bullet for use in a gun

Add to word list
Add to word list
a container that is used in a larger piece of equipment, and which can be replaced with another similar part: a video game cartridge
A cartridge is also a tube containing an explosive substance and often a bullet for use in a gun.
